trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona
There were 6 other sightings in Sedona on or around January 13th 2000
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It consisted of a number of arrow shaped objects and traveling at a fast rate of speed
Object Shape: Cigar, Cylinder, Disc, Flash, Square, Rectagular, Other
divs: Sighting DetailsThe first craft was photographed on January 13 2000 and consist of arrow shaped objects that I have since videotaped with two to five attached as seen in this photo. The second craft was videotaped on October 16 2003 and has an upside down skate board appearance while the last was videptaped on September 12 2004 and has a disc like appearance. Note the last has a dark seperation line between the top and its bottom section. All were taped while the camera was facing south and sitting on a tripod. The dark section on all the photos left is the roof section of my home which I used to keep the sun off the camera lens.
